name: Destroy Lonely
description:
'''Bobby Wardell Sandimanie III''' (born July 30, 2001), known professionally as '''Destroy Lonely''', is an American rapper, singer and songwriter. His first full-length album, ''[[If Looks Could Kill (Destroy Lonely album)|If Looks Could Kill]]'' (2023), peaked at number 18 on the [[Billboard 200|US ''Billboard'' 200]]. Prior to that, his fifth mixtape, ''[[No Stylist (mixtape)|No Stylist]]'' (2022), marked his first entry on the chart at number 91.

Destroy Lonely is signed to fellow Atlanta-based rapper [[Playboi Carti]]'s record label [[Opium (record label)|Opium]], an imprint of [[Interscope Records]], in early 2021; he frequently collaborates with labelmates, rapper [[Ken Carson]] and [[trap music|trap]] duo [[Homixide Gang]]. ''[[Rolling Stone]] '' cites Destroy Lonely as being characterized by his "dynamic yet blaring" instrumentals, and his unique performing aesthetic consisting of dark-colored attire and name-brand clothing.
